title: Penetrated on Ponetown
description: On a mission to bring the love of literacy to impoverished rural children, Clover Willoughby finds herself stranded on a dry, dusty West Virginia back road. Out of gas, out of service, and out of patience, she starts walking. When she stumbles across a quaint cabin in the woods, she's relieved at her good fortune. Her relief turns to trepidation—and anticipation—when the rough, crude mountain man living there offers to assist her . . . for a price. And he's not interested in money.THIS BOOK WAS PREVIOUSLY TITLED PENETRATED ON PONETOWN. This is the first novella in a planned series. It is NOT a full-length book.(Disclaimer: this novella is for adults only. It contains explicit sex, rough sex, ménage situations, sex with strangers, and taboo elements that some might find offensive.)
author: Moxie Darling
